title: That sad, sad moment...
body:
When your main is disabled.

http://imgur.com/hMJ0GTe

http://imgur.com/T3cvMnq

replies.body: are you sure the sad moment isn't that you're still silver V after investing that much time and practice into him? Doesn't seem like you are learning anything.
Can't go anywhere without someone like this.

do you feel like you are getting better at azir? Was a genuine comment not trying to shit on anything. As some one who mains nasus and works to erase any mistakes from his play after every game on the champ I am wondering why you are not improving on your azir play or if you don't care
It's none of your business and it doesn't freaking matter dude. It's just a meme...sorta. Get over yourself and stop trying to call out people
who am I trying to call out? just asked a question. You are very defensive when it was nothing to do with you. Get over yourself.

You may not realize this.... But you are kind of a douche. If you are trying to legitimately ask a question and not be a douche. Then read your comment before posting it and think to yourself, "Would a douche say this?" If the answer is yes, don't post it.
I mean... 897k points with azir i don't even have anyone at level 5 and im atleast gold. sooooooo yeaah didn't seem like a douche to me cus i kinda want to know too.
And you've been playing since season 2. I started last year.
BUUUURRN
and he has been gold for at least 3 seasons, speaking of not improving. what a scrub, hahaha {{champion:53}}
nah just a double standard. Only a douche would call some one else a douche and insult people and you did it. So I guess you are a douche too by your logic?
My upvotes and your downvotes disagree with you.

the majority of people are incredibly stupid so its not a good thing that the majority agrees with you.

And that kinda comment proves that you are a douche, grats :)
You keep thinking that bud.
nothing to think, you sound and act like a douche. already confirmed.
Since I see no other ending to this other than a "nuh uh, ya huh, nuh uh, ya huh" kind of situation, I bid you a good day sir.
Thats what happens when you know you're wrong, cya later thanks for playing
More of a relatable joke.

Haters gonna hate man. Just keep playing your bird man (when he's up again anyway) :)

Edit: Oh also the guy has a history of chat restrictions apparently, kinda shows.

Edit to ^ that edit: [Check this post out, the Riot response is hilarious.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/QIG5j3o8-paging-riot-tantram?comment=00000000000000000000000000000000)

It's interesting to note that Silver 5 means you're better than well over a third of the people that play ranked League. Playing on a level to deserve to be in Silver. Not to mention everyone starts out with different natural skill levels. For example I started in Bronze 5 and it's taken two years to work my way up to Gold. So I think it's best to not be so quick to judge
Where do you find the population of each rank? It sounds like something that would be interesting to see.

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/rankings/rank-distribution

Here you go!

>897.4k

o.O
need a Tier 11 banner to go with it?
Was looking forward to his bug fixes this patch when suddenly...
Dear lord, Azir gets bugs like Sona used to get nerfs.
Should've seen release Azir. *gag*
Trying to fix Azir bugs? Nerf Irelia.
Whats wrong with him? I dont think I've noticed anything when playing with him yesterday, just went on a 4 game win streak in ranked, then he was disabled lel. Btw I main him too .

The bug was that if you spawned a soldier and immediately auto'd, you sometimes wouldn't be able to cast abilities for a good 5 seconds, and the first ability you *tried* to cast during that time went off after that amount of time was up.

It's a bug with the whole ability queuing thing they implemented and completely didn't need to. I personally think they should just leave him alone save for any buffs or nerfs later down the line. He worked fine the way they had him. No idea why they did anything at all in the first place.

EDIT: Straight from Rito - Soldiers would do 3-4x the damage they should've.

Here's to hoping the bug I noticed didn't go unnoticed by Riot.

Do you think the late cast bug is the Q delay bug that Riot Exgeniar is looking for?
If so you should leave him a comment somewhere; sounds like you have a repro if that's the case.  Might be the lead that he needs to solve it.
 http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/nEc6E2Tn-azir-hidden-nerfbug-in-patch-65?comment=00010000000000000000
Thanks! Hope I can help it out.
That's how I felt when Aatrox was disabled a week ago :(
who?
{{champion:83}} this guy
ohh urgot, took me some time but i remembered his name
dont be an idiot thats galio
What the fuck is a Galio?
I think it's a type of exotic soup.
Not this again
This man lives and breathes Shurima

I feel sorry for you azir mains, your bird is buggier than every other champion combined

here, to cheer you up: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UHFGeY-s65g
The end. The fucking end. Oh god. xD
it's his old outro with him singing on top of it :P
That's not a main. That's a one-trick-birdie. :P
I feel you. I main Azir too.

Let us mourn the loss of our Emporer together.

{{item:3070}} {{champion:268}} {{item:3070}}

Do not mourn.

Your Emperor shall return.
When Azir gets re-enabled, I'm making a thread about it.
damn almost 1m xp! I play a shitton of yi and I only have 250k
your partner must love you, you really work that clicking finger in all the right ways
